actions.title: A Gentleman's Arrangement
actions.description: Offer to send 10 of our people to support another faction. In return, ask for 15 Influence. Call it goodwill — even if no one buys it.

actions.title: Fund the Movement
actions.description: Your faction is backing a rising movement in exchange for manpower. Offer 10 Money to any faction willing to send you 15 People.

actions.title: Resource Swap
actions.description: Your faction is low on funds but holds sway in the city. Offer 10 Influence to any faction willing to pay you 10 Money.

actions.title: Resource Swap
actions.description: You need funds, and your faction is willing to send 10 People to work with another faction in exchange for 10 Money.

actions.title: Resource Swap
actions.description: You’re offering skilled people to gain political leverage. Trade 10 People to any faction willing to give you 10 Influence.

actions.title: Charity Campaign
actions.description: To build trust and gain supporters, your faction offers 10 Money to those in need, hoping to receive 15 People in return.

actions.title: Influencer Partnership
actions.description: Your faction is looking to raise its profile. Trade 15 People for 10 Influence with any faction that agrees to amplify your agenda
